name: Sisyfaux
description:
Sisyphus cheated death and as punishment, he must forever push a boulder up a hill, never able to make it to the top. But Hades got the wrong man! Sisyfaux didn't deserve such punishment, and he can prove it by escaping from the Underworld.

Go, Sisyfaux!, Use your wits (and that big boulder you are chained to) to get past all of Hades' traps and trickery and escape. Push, pull and ride the boulder (and sometimes let the boulder control you) as you escape the underworld.

Programming by LittleBattler, everything else by Two Separate Gorillas and Nantenjex

Assets Used

  • Hi-Bit Fantasy Lava Caves Platformer Tileset by Namatnieks
  • Deep Forest - Limited 16 colour palette tileset by Namatnieks
  • Humble Fonts Gold Pack by Eeve Somepx
  • The song "Penultimate" by Abstraction (https://abstractionmusic.bandcamp.com)
